item.title: E-CTF - Web - Favourite Website
item.description: Web - Favourite Website - writeup Description After a long time, Alex tries to visit his favorite website. But nobody thought he would become very unlucky. Visit the website and help him get the flag. Link: https://wec-ctf-2022-web.herokuapp.com/q2 Writeup If we refresh the webpage we see there is a cookie that changes everytime i refresh the page. That cookie is called _gatj Currently its value is c3RpbGwgY2Fubm90IHNvbHZlIHRoaXMgdGFzaz90aW1lcz0wMDAwMDAwOCZpZD03Yzg3ZjBlOC1hODNiLTQyZDQtYmU1MS1hYWI5MjY5MzRjYzI3 That is base64 and decodes to still cannot solve this task?
